title: Alternative Medicine Studies
description: Alternative Medicine Studies will be launched in early September as a new, Open Access, online-only scientific journal about alternative medical systems as: Acupuncture · Anthroposophic medicine · Ayurveda · Chiropractic · Herbalism · Homeopathy ...
